texteng: This is the result of a one week workshop led by Sociedad 0. The main goal was to create an object from found or reused material. We decided to recreate Donald Judd's Chair Benches 22, later transformed into two chairs, from scraps of wood and leftover furniture. Contrary to the original work, the final piece highlights the sincerity of the material, which does not hide its imperfections, on the contrary, they explain by themselves the history of this brutalist bench.
textcat: Aquest és el resultat d'un taller d'una setmana dirigit per Societat 0. L'objectiu principal era crear un objecte a partir de material trobat o reutilitzat. Vam decidir recrear els bancs de cadires 22 de Donald Judd, posteriorment transformats en dues cadires, a partir de restes de fusta i mobles sobrants. Contràriament a l'obra original, la peça final destaca la sinceritat del material, que no amaga les seves imperfeccions, al contrari, expliquen per ells mateixos la història d'aquest banc brutalista.
